https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wciCIPVIamo2ygnLYGJAUATvkJf.jpg They say that it is not right to call him a big guy, but I can't find a better way to talk about my BIGGEST friend. Sometimes big people even seem to forget that I exist, but never when he is by my side: at those times, I feel like I am the greatest! Amigãozão
